movies.title: Hard Rock Nightmare
movies.plot: A child is convinced his grandfather is a monster and kills him. Years later he returns with his friends to the sight of the killing. It appears to be his grandfather's revenge as one by one his friends are brutally murdered.
movies.simplePlot: A child is convinced his grandfather is a monster and kills him. Years later he returns with his friends to the sight of the killing. It appears to be his grandfather's revenge as one by one his friends are brutally murdered.

biography.bio: Greg Joujon-Roche is known for his work on Spider-Man (2002), Troy (2004) and G.I. Jane (1997). He died on July 31, 2016 in Malibu, California, USA.
biography.name: Greg Joujon-Roche

biography.bio: Annie Mikan is an actress, known for Hard Rock Nightmare (1988).
biography.name: Annie Mikan

biography.bio: Lisa Elaina is an actress, known for Blood Diner (1987), Hard Rock Nightmare (1988) and About Love (1993).
biography.name: Lisa Elaina

biography.bio: Robert D. Peverley is an actor, known for Hard Rock Nightmare (1988).
biography.name: Robert D. Peverley

biography.bio: Bryan Kovacs is an actor, known for Hard Rock Nightmare (1988).
biography.name: Bryan Kovacs

biography.bio: Tom Shell is a producer and production manager, known for Special Ops (2010), Alone in the Dark II (2008) and Wind River (2000).
biography.name: Tom Shell

biography.bio: Susan Grillo is an actress, known for Bubblegum Crash (1991), Bubblegum Crisis (1987) and Hard Rock Nightmare (1988).
biography.name: Susan Grillo

biography.bio: Gary Hays is an actor, known for The 'Burbs (1989), Busted (1997) and Evil Laugh (1986).
biography.name: Gary Hays

biography.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Troy Donahue was a journalism student at Columbia University when he began playing in stock productions. He made his film debut in Man Afraid (1957) and in 1959 signed as a contract player with Warner Bros., which promoted him to stardom with A Summer Place (1959) that year. He was soon a teenage heartthrob, his blond hair and blue eyes appearing frequently on the covers of movie magazines. His most successful film was Parrish (1961), in which he played the title character. A few years after that his career went into a decline; he made only a few television movies between the mid-'60s and his small role in The Godfather: Part II (1974) (in which his character's name, Merle Johnson, was actually his real name). His later films were almost entirely for the low-budget home video market, e.g., Sexpot (1990) and Nudity Required (1990).
biography.name: Troy Donahue

biography.bio: Johnny Venocur was born as Johnny Venokur. He is an actor and producer, known for Savage Streets (1984), Lord of Illusions (1995) and An American Vampire Story (1997).
biography.name: Johnny Venocur

biography.bio: Steven Baio is an actor and producer, known for General Hospital (1963), Evil Laugh (1986) and The Hunted (1998).
biography.name: Steven Baio

biography.bio: Valerie Richards is an actress, known for Jailbird Rock (1988), Appointment with Death (1988) and The Kiss (2008).
biography.name: Valerie Richards
